The claim was published on the website W: WNDR), which is known for publishing fictional news articles.
The disclaimer on the WNDR website clear: 3. The photographs used in the article were unrelated and taken from different sources, including a mugshot from 2011 and a photograph of a police commissioner from a different event.
The final photograph in the article: depicting an elevator shaft, was taken inside the National Lift Tower in Northampton, England, which has no connection to the alleged incident in Philadelphia.
